text: 2:19-20 Matyu 15:14; 23:16-19; Luk 18:9; Jon 9:40; Rom 6:17; 2 Timoti 3:5; 3:15Ia kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, Moses Osirizir Araziba fofozimɨn mɨngarir aghuim ko guizɨn akaba bar e ganɨngi. Kamaghɨn ia ghaze, e gumazamizir damazir okavɨrɨziba tuavim men akakasi. Egha mɨtatemɨn itir gumazamiziba, angazangarim men akakasi. Egha gumazamizir onganiba fofozim me ganɨga, borir dozibar sure gami.
